amendment.description: An amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, as as modified by the amendment printed in part A of House Report 108-146.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Transportation amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastruct.
